00030 /**
00031  * Flexform sheet class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The name of the sheet
00042      */
00043     protected $_name     = '';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The file with the language labels
00047      */
00048     protected $_langFile = '';
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * An array with the flexform fields/sections
00052      */
00053     protected $_fields   = array();
00054     
00055     /**
00056      * Class constructor
00057      * 
00058      * @param   string  The name of the sheet
00059      * @param   string  The reference of the file with the labels for the flexform (typically: EXT:extkey/path/to/lang/file)
00060      * @return  NULL
00061      */
00062     public function __construct( $name, $langFile )
00063     {
00064         $this->_name     = ( string )$name;
00065         $this->_langFile = ( string )$langFile;
00066     }
00067     
00068     /**
00069      * Adds the flexform sheet to a flexform XML object
00070      * 
00071      * @param   SimpleXMLElement    The sheets flexform XML object
00072      * @return  NULL
00073      */
00074     public function addSheetXmlObject( SimpleXMLElement $sheets )
00075     {
00076         // Sheet name
00077         $name  = $this->_name;
00078         
00079         // Creates the sheet structure
00080         $sheets->$name->ROOT->type                 = 'array';
00081         $sheets->$name->ROOT->TCEforms->sheetTitle = 'LLL:'
00082                                                    . $this->_langFile
00083                                                    . ':'
00084                                                    . $this->_name;
00085         
00086         // A reference of the 'el' object
00087         $el = $sheets->$name->ROOT->addChild( 'el' );
00088         
00089         // Process each field
00090         foreach( $this->_fields as $key => $value ) {
00091             
00092             // Creates the field XML object
00093             $value->addFieldXmlObject( $el );
00094         }
00095     }
00096     
00097     /**
00098      * Adds a field to the sheet
00099      * 
00100      * @param   string                          The name of the field
00101      * @param   string                          The type of the field
00102      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Field           The flexform field object
00103      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception If the field already exists
00104      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception If the field type is invalid
00105      */
00106     public function addField( $name, $type )
00107     {
00108         // Checks if the field already exists
00109         if( isset( $this->_fields[ $name ] ) ) {
00110             
00111             // The field already exists
00112             throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception(
00113                 'The field \'' . $name . '\' already exists. Please use the ' . __CLASS__ . '::getField() method instead.',
00114                 tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception::EXCEPTION_FIELD_ALREADY_EXISTS
00115             );
00116         }
00117         
00118         // Checks the field type to get the field object class
00119         switch( $type ) {
00120             
00121             // Valid TYPO3 field types
00122             case 'input':
00123             case 'text':
00124             case 'check':
00125             case 'radio':
00126             case 'select':
00127             case 'group':
00128             case 'none':
00129             case 'passthrough':
00130             case 'user':
00131             case 'inline':
00132             case 'section':
00133                 
00134                 // Field class
00135                 $fieldClass = 'tx_oop_Flexform_Field_' . ucfirst( $type );
00136                 break;
00137             
00138             // Invalid field type
00139             default:
00140                 
00141                 // Exception, as the field type is not recognized
00142                 throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception(
00143                     'The requested field type (' . $type . ') for field \'' . $name . '\' is not a valid TYPO3 flexform field.',
00144                     tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception::EXCEPTION_INVALID_FIELD_TYPE
00145                 );
00146         }
00147         
00148         // Creates the field object
00149         $this->_fields[ $name ] = new $fieldClass( $name, $this->_name, $this->_langFile );
00150         
00151         // Returns the field
00152         return $this->_fields[ $name ];
00153     }
00154     
00155     /**
00156      * Gets a field from the sheet
00157      * 
00158      * @param   string                          The name of the field
00159      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Field           The flexform field object
00160      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception If the field does not exists
00161      */
00162     public function getField( $name )
00163     {
00164         // Checks if the field exists
00165         if( isset( $this->_fields[ $name ] ) ) {
00166             
00167             // Returns the field
00168             return $this->_fields[ $name ];
00169         }
00170         
00171         // No such field
00172         throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception(
00173             'The requested field does not exist (' . $name . '). You should first add it with the ' . __CLASS__ . '::addField() method.',
00174             tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_FIELD
00175         );
00176     }
00177 }
